error.signature: Warning: Can't perform a React state update on an unmounted component
error.regex: Can't perform a React state update on an unmounted component|memory leak

verdict.summary: State update after component unmount. Missing cleanup in useEffect for async operations.

dead_ends.action: Ignore the warning — it's just a warning
dead_ends.why_fails: Causes memory leaks and wasted computation
Anti-pattern — use AbortController or cleanup function instead

workarounds.action: Return a cleanup function from useEffect with AbortController
For subscriptions, unsubscribe in cleanup: return () => unsubscribe()
